rewrite1: To format the fifth paragraph, please proceed as follows: first, remove the bold styling from the text. Next, assign it a Level 1 Outline style. Then, set a 1cm hanging indent. Adjust the left indent to 2cm, and finally, underline the text.
rewrite2: In the fifth paragraph, please remove the bold formatting. Then, assign it a Level 1 Outline style. Next, set up a 1cm hanging indent and adjust the left indentation to 2 cm. Finally, underline the entire paragraph.
rewrite3: In the fifth paragraph, please remove any bold formatting from the text. Then, assign it as a Level 1 Outline. Next, set up a 1 cm hanging indent. Adjust the left indent to 2 cm, and finally, underline the text.
